text:
aqgnirbRuqhadva#yA viSvaqjithsaha#ntyaqH SrEShThO# gandhaqrvaH ||
tvatpi#tArO agnE dEqvAstvA-mA#hutayaqstva-dvi#vAcanAH |
saM mAmAyu#ShAq saM gau#paqtyEnaq suhi#tE mA dhAH ||
aqyamaqgniH SrEShTha#tamOq &yaM Baga#vattamOq &ya(gm) sa#hasraqsAta#maH |
aqsmA a#stu suqvIrya$M ||
manOq jyOti# rjuShatAqmAjyaMq ~MvicCi#nnaM ~Myaqj~ja(gm) samiqmaM da#dhAtu |
yA iqShTA uqShasO# niqmruca#Scaq tAH saM da#dhAmi haqviShA# GRuqtEna# ||
paya#svatIqrOSha#dhayaqH - [  ] 44
